thread.section_title: Manchester United target Antoine Griezmann insists he wants to stay at Atletico Madrid – Metro
thread.title: Manchester United target Antoine Griezmann insists he wants to stay at Atletico Madrid
thread.title_full: Manchester United target Antoine Griezmann insists he wants to stay at Atletico Madrid

author: Sean Kearns
title: Manchester United target Antoine Griezmann insists he wants to stay at Atletico Madrid
text:
Antoine Griezmann is a target for Manchester United (Picture: Getty) Antoine Griezmann has delivered a major blow to Manchester United’s chances of signing him this summer by insisting he wants to stay at Atletico Madrid.
The Frenchman has been widely linked with a move to Old Trafford and the Red Devils are thought to be open to activating an £85million release clause in his contract.
Neymar drops transfer bombshell when naming the FOUR Premier League clubs he admires The 25-year-old has enjoyed another sensational season under Diego Simeone at the Vicente Calderon, scoring 23 goals in 44 appearances for the Argentine’s side.
Jose Mourinho will be given signficant funds to reinvest in his side again this summer but the Red Devils may have to cast their search elsewhere after Griezmann insisted he wanted to stay at the La Liga club.
Griezmann’s hit 23 goals this term (Picture: Getty) ‘No, I don’t want to leave Atletico,’ said Griezmann.
‘To go to Paris [Saint-Germain], China, USA, Russia or anywhere else.’
MORE: Chelsea ace Asmir Begovic says Jose Mourinho and Antonio Conte don’t like one another
